What are the essential steps to set up my Verus wallet?
The essential steps to set up your Verus wallet include installing or updating the latest version of the wallet, making a backup of your wallet, and installing the bootstrap.

If you followed these steps, you will have installed/updated the latest version of a wallet for verus, made a backup of your wallet and installed the bootstrap. If desired you can remove the downloaded bootstrap archive to free up space on your hard drive.

### Optional:
Watch this video with an explanation how to accomplish the steps above: [Bootstrapping your wallet manually](https://youtu.be/ILr8vDgfPHI)

Information compiled by Oink.vrsc@.

If you followed these steps, you will have installed/updated the latest version of a wallet for verus, made a backup of your wallet and installed the bootstrap. If desired you can remove the downloaded bootstrap archive to free up space on your hard drive.

Do I need to keep the bootstrap archive after setting up my wallet?
No, you don't need to keep the bootstrap archive after setting up your wallet. You can remove it to free up space on your hard drive if desired.

If you followed these steps, you will have installed/updated the latest version of a wallet for verus, made a backup of your wallet and installed the bootstrap. If desired you can remove the downloaded bootstrap archive to free up space on your hard drive.
